au.edu.rmit.tzar.repository

Interface CodeRepository

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    LocalFileRepository, SvnRepository

    public interface CodeRepository
    Returns a file path for a given code revision. Implementations may choose to ignore the revision number if not relevant.

    • Method Summary

      Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      java.lang.String getHeadRevision()
      Gets the revision of current head for this repository.
      java.io.File retrieveModel(java.lang.String revision)
      Checks out the model code from code repository into a local directory at the provided revision.
      java.io.File retrieveProjectParams(java.lang.String projectParamFilename, java.lang.String revision)
      Checks out the project params file from the repository at the given revision.

    • Method Detail

      • retrieveModel

        java.io.File retrieveModel(java.lang.String revision)
                           throws TzarException
        Checks out the model code from code repository into a local directory at the provided revision.
        Parameters:
        revision - the version of the model / framework to load
        Returns:
        the path to the cached model / framework code
        Throws:
        TzarException - if an error occurs contacting the repository

      • retrieveProjectParams

        java.io.File retrieveProjectParams(java.lang.String projectParamFilename,
                                 java.lang.String revision)
                                   throws TzarException
        Checks out the project params file from the repository at the given revision.
        Parameters:
        projectParamFilename - filename of the project params
        revision - the revision to retrieve
        Returns:
        the local path to the retrieved file
        Throws:
        TzarException - if an error occurs retrieving the file

      • getHeadRevision

        java.lang.String getHeadRevision()
                                 throws TzarException
        Gets the revision of current head for this repository.
        Returns:
        the revision. This will be a number for subversion, but may be a string for other repositories, eg git.
        Throws:
        TzarException - if an error occurs contacting the repository
